DOC.brief_title: Preventing Recurrent Bleeding After Eradication Esophageal Varices
DOC.detailed_description: Cirrhotic patient acute recent esophageal variceal bleed undergo band ligation 1-month interval eradication esophageal varix . Patients start propranolol ( start 30 mg daily ) 6th day control acute bleeding till eradication esophageal varix , aim decrease pulse rate 25 % 55 bpm systolic pressure 85 mmHg . Patients randomized propranolol group continue propranolol eradication esophageal varix . Patients randomize band ligation group discontinue propranolol eradication esophageal varix . Patients follow evaluate incidence rebleeding , adverse effect survival .
